item.title: 'Namespaced' claims in Keycloak
item.description: Keycloak 4.2.0 In previous versions of Keycloak, it was not possible to create claims in the token using a claim name containing a period as a seperator. Since 4.2.0, it is possible to escape the dot character in the configuration, so a claim name with the dot character can be used. "choudeshell\.com/role_type" Something that took me an inordinate amount of time was trying to add custom ‘namespaced’ claims to the Keycloak’s access_token.
